vandal king infected arian heresie proved cruel barbarous persecutours orthodox beginning pontificate lived germanus epiphanius latter bishop pavia former capua men authority sanctity life gaind humble obliging deportment wrought much upon mind barbarous invadors afflicted italy fared better sake time also lannociatus abbat chartres aurelianus mezentius poictiers person great piety learning took henry part dignity preferment likewise laid curse upon emperour degraded imperial honour degradation deprivation form followeth blessed peter prince apostle beseech thee hearken unto heat thy servant thou hast educated infancy preserved day hand wicked men hate persecute faith thee thou art best witness thou holy mother jesus christ together paul thy fellow martyr enter upon papacy without reluctance thought robbery lawfully rise thy chair willing spend day pilgrimage time supply thy place ostentation vainglory must need confess thy goodness desert brought cure christendom gave power loosing binding therefore confidence honour safety church deprive king henry son henry formerly emperour imperial power name father son holy ghost boldly rashly laid violent hand upon thy church absolve christian subject oath bind em pay allegiance true lawful king fit lose honour would diminish honour church furthermore contemnd mine rather thy admonition concerning people salvation separated church god would fain destroy set curse well assured thou art peter upon whose rock true foundation christ jesus king built church time great many talkd peace execration past gregory made answer condition peace henry would first make peace god said must need know injury done church often admonished reform life conversation respect henry father memory good friend purpose entertaind principle quite contrary father nevertheless present continud urge persuade king ought anathematizd hastily pope replyd said christ committed church peter said feed sheep except king gave peter power bind loose excepted none exempted man authority wherefore say cannot bound church power must need confess cannot absolved whosoever impudent affirm make perfect separatist christ church henry heard city told mansionhouse roman empire thereupon henry drew force near city made great bustle though guido got allayd tumult composition made upon term guido marcelli maffeo captain general horse thus emperor gotten possession millain almost adjacent city surrendred presently except alessandria received iron crown millain according custom put citizen much expence commonalty finding rather oppressed vested liberty expected betook arm german seeing men killd faction went suburb city called head party em galeatius son maffeo viconti left father home went considerable number suppliant wait upon persuasion guido thirty faction killd four turrianos henry moved toward cremona crema called guelphs turnd gibellins dealt mildly cremoneses rendered freely though little severer upon cremeses country civil discord among em cause much bloodshed every city nay every little castle citizen slain old men murtherd young child dashd ground boundless cruelty whereupon clement used saying homer let one chief lord one judg matter henry went toward rome sent lewis savoy son amadeus five hundred horse taking quarter one stephen columnas house near lateran put vrsin faction terrible fear henry came first viterbo thence rome kindly received onely nobility citizen general crownd three cardinal made roman swear allegiance custom made great feast invited nobleman city except vrsins lest concourse people arise tumult animosity men planted soldier theatre bath fortified place strength guard confident courage demand people tribute never used pay hereupon citizen faction fled vrsins set good guard horse quarterd far aid roman people forced emperour retreat far tivoli john robert brother went away command cardinal left city quiet henry going perugia arrived arezzo accused robert king treason
